testcase.classname: Register | User could register with new account
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field..................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid email and password...............................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page invalid scenario................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button invalid scenario.............................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Choose Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page
testcase.name: choose Euro Currency
testcase.system-out: Given Select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then verify Euro Symbol is shown............................................passed
